item.title: Digital Intentionalization: Don’t click that next button
item.author: michael@datachain.consulting (Michael John Peña)
item.description: It’s very tempting to click on “that next button” wether that is from YouTube, Netflix, Facebook videos or any endless buffet of consumption.
